pullrequest.title: Fixed bug with timing in labscript

content.raw:
@shaunj Are you running this version in the lab at the moment? Just want to make sure it's been tested somewhat on a live machine.

@cbillington yeah, let's merge without addressing #39 for now (I'll do it once I hear back from Shaun). I'd appreciate your insight into whether there is something better we could do for #39.
